title: World Health Organization has not issued any protocol for lockdowns
subtitle: ‘WHO South-East Asia’ has tweeted that the message on WHO Protocol and Procedure of Lockdown Periods in India is baseless and fake
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A message is being shared widely on social media with a claim that, as per WHO’s ‘Protocol and Procedure of Lockdown Periods’, lockdown will be relaxed from April 15 – 19 and will be re-imposed from April 20 in India. FACTLY has found that WHO has already clarified regarding the message. ‘WHO South-East Asia’ has tweeted saying that the message is baseless and fake.

Did you watch our new video?
